title: Writing Style for Print vs. Web
html:
Linear vs. non-linear. Author-driven vs. reader-driven. Storytelling vs. ruthless pursuit of actionable content. Anecdotal examples vs. comprehensive data. Sentences vs. fragments.

Un article de Jakob Nielsen sur l'écriture web : Writing Style for Print vs. Web. Vous pouvez lire d'autres articles du pape de l'écriture web sur la page : Papers and Essays by Jakob Nielsen.
